value:
$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Time...$k$pNothing is outside time.$k$pAll life falls within time—beginning,
middle, and end.$k$pTime's flow is absolute, and none
can escape it.$k$pNone...but me.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This is it. We've finally arrived.$k$pThis is Gullveig's keep...the Hold of
the Golden Seer.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Is everyone ready? This will be our
last chance, the deciding conflict.$k$pIf we can't defeat Gullveig here
and now, we and everyone in Askr
will be erased from history...$k$pWe cannot fail here! We must
succeed, for the sake of our world!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We won't lose! I know it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We've always found a way before.
I have faith we can do so now as well.$k$pWe have nothing to worry about,
right, $Nu?$k$p$EFace_Pain|I-is something wrong? You look
a bit confused... We will need your
focus ahead.$k$pWe are approaching Gullveig's keep...
You remember, don't you?$k$pHas something happened? You don't
look well...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Could it... Is this one of the side
effects of crossing through time?$k$pThe temporal gateway can disorder
the memories of those who pass
through it... Is that what happened?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what?! Are you saying that
the gate may have erased all of
$Nu's memories?$k$pI think...I can remember everything
that's happened... Can you, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I believe so, but... Hmm...
It's impossible to say.$k$pEven if we had lost some of our
memories, I'm not sure we would
be able to see it ourselves.$k$pThis place...this time... This is the
world of what is to come. We are
not meant to be here.$k$pStrange happenings should not
come as a surprise.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|That's right. Which means we should
get out of here as quickly as possible.
Let's hurry, everyone!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE14_15,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Since your memory seems to be
suffering, I would like to explain who
Gullveig is and tell you our plan...$k$pThe fact of the matter is, however,
that we still know next to nothing
about Gullveig.$k$pThe only thing I can say for sure
is that she is capable of destroying
everything—our entire world.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gullveig arrived in the borderlands
between Askr and Embla and began
her invasion...$k$pNearly the entire continent has
been reduced to wastelands.$k$pThe death toll is beyond measure.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|She has...complete mastery of time.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We were finally able to locate her
fortress before she was able to
complete her invasion.$k$pThat is where we find ourselves now.
We've jumped across time, to the
far future.$k$pWe must defeat her here to return
our world to how it should be.$k$pIf we fail...it will be the end
of everything.$k$p$Sbs150|
